name: Lê Dinh
description: '''Lê Dinh''' (1934 – 9 November 2020) was a [[Vietnamese Canadians|Vietnamese-Canadian]] songwriter. From 1957 to 1975 he worked at Radio Saigon. In 1978 he emigrated, via [[Taiwan]] to [[Montreal]]. He criticized the sterility of [[socialism|Socialist]] music since 1975.
